original_text: And they gathered it every morning, every man according to his eating: and when the sun waxed hot, it melted.
korean_text: 무리가 아침마다 각 사람은 먹을 만큼만 거두었고 햇볕이 뜨겁게 쬐면 그것이 스러졌더라

sentences.original_text: And they gathered it every morning
every man according to his eating
and when the sun waxed hot
